metadata.description: How much you can count on each other when it matters

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Saturn shows reliability and long-term commitment. Pluto adds depth and loyalty under pressure. Sun shows core respect.

planet_meanings.Saturn: reliability, commitment, and showing up consistently
planet_meanings.Pluto: depth of loyalty and standing by each other through hard times
planet_meanings.Sun: core respect and honoring who each other is

very_low.label: Flimsy
very_low.guidance: May disappear when things get real; warn about leaning too hard.

low.label: Patchy
low.guidance: Support comes in waves; watch actions, not just words.

mid.label: Decent
mid.guidance: Can show up, but not as primary lifeline.

high.label: Steady
high.guidance: Usually there when it matters; invite mutual showing up.

very_high.label: Ride-or-Die
very_high.guidance: Very strong loyalty; core person in their corner.
